content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1624037921843{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-image: url(https://univelcity.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Title-Header-BG-1.png?id=2965) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Online classes!

[vc_custom_heading text=”Online Live Classes” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

Our online program provides a live interactive learning experience for students so they can kickstart their career in tech from the convenience.
Book your seat before November 1st and start learning!

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”BROWSE COURSES” style=”custom” custom_background=”#10e1bb” custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” size=”lg” css=”.vc_custom_1624018677801{margin-top: 30px !important;}” link=”url:%23courses|||”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1623932308851{padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column parallax=”content-moving” width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Learn new tech skills with Univelcity’s online courses” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:28px|text_align:left|line_height:1.2em” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Want to learn Product Design(UI/UX) or Data Science? Join our online program and learn wherever you are. 🚀

In the past four years, we have trained hundreds of Designers, Developers, and Data Scientists in an in-person instructor-led class setting and have nailed it.

Now, we would like to take that our experience to reach a more global community with the secret recipe we use in delivering quality training that helps the participants achieve their set objectives in the shortest period of time with over 99% completion state.

Now, we are bringing our classes to where you are!

Sign up until November 1st by filling out the form to enroll for the online live class and start your tech journey with us![/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1624008672014{padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” el_class=”formshadow” css=”.vc_custom_1624008473018{padding-top: 0px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1624008583940{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Sign Up Until November 1st” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:28px|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”20″ disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1624016253749{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #17355c !important;}”][vc_column]
Online Courses

Start Learning

Our curriculum uses a Project-based learning approach and perfect for beginners and experience individuals

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”bottom” gap=”20″][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1623932671205{padding-top: 5px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Data Science With Python” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left|color:%231f2435″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1624013723962{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]Learn Data Science with Python and advance to coding your own data applications and boost your career. Rapid technological advances in Data Science are reshaping the globe.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”VIEW MORE INFORMATION” style=”outline-custom” outline_custom_color=”#1f2435″ outline_custom_hover_background=”#10e1bb” outline_custom_hover_text=”#ffffff” size=”lg” align=”center” button_block=”true” link=”url:%23|||”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1623932679510{padding-top: 5px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”DevOps Engineering” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left|color:%231f2435″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1624013856187{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]This course is completely project-based and designed to provide you with in-depth knowledge of various DevOps tools and prepare you for a career in DevOps.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”VIEW MORE INFORMATION” style=”outline-custom” outline_custom_color=”#1f2435″ outline_custom_hover_background=”#10e1bb” outline_custom_hover_text=”#ffffff” size=”lg” align=”center” button_block=”true” link=”url:%23|||”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1619″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”20″ css=”.vc_custom_1624018738972{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: #17355c !important;}” el_id=”courses”][vc_column]
Online Courses

Start Learning

Our curriculum uses a Project-based learning approach and perfect for beginners and experience individuals

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”bottom” gap=”20″ css=”.vc_custom_1625561399007{padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1624743694985{padding-top: 5px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Product Design(UI/UX)” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1624748559634{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}” el_class=”p-white”]User interface and user experience design are high in demand but the skills and knowledge you will learn in this specialization are applicable to a wide variety of fields.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”VIEW MORE INFORMATION” style=”outline-custom” outline_custom_color=”#17355c” outline_custom_hover_background=”#10e1bb” outline_custom_hover_text=”#ffffff” size=”lg” align=”center” button_block=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fonline%2Fproduct-designui-ux%2F|||”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1624018368285{padding-top: 5px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Data Science With Python” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1624015238351{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}” el_class=”p-white”]Learn Data Science with Python and advance to coding your own data applications and boost your career. Rapid technological advances in Data Science are reshaping the globe.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”VIEW MORE INFORMATION” style=”outline-custom” outline_custom_color=”#17355c” outline_custom_hover_background=”#10e1bb” outline_custom_hover_text=”#ffffff” size=”lg” align=”center” button_block=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fonline%2Fpython-for-data-science%2F|||”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1624018379320{padding-top: 5px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-12″][vc_custom_heading text=”DevOps Engineering” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1624015265882{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}” el_class=”p-white”]This course is completely project-based and designed to provide you with in-depth knowledge of various DevOps tools and prepare you for a career in DevOps.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”VIEW MORE INFORMATION” style=”outline-custom” outline_custom_color=”#17355c” outline_custom_hover_background=”#10e1bb” outline_custom_hover_text=”#ffffff” size=”lg” align=”center” button_block=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fonline%2Fdevops-engineering%2F|||”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner content_placement=”bottom” gap=”20″ css=”.vc_custom_1625561399007{padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1624743694985{padding-top: 5px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Frontend Web Development” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fonline%2Ffrontend-web-development%2F|title:Frontend%20Web%20Development||”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1634658959564{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}” el_class=”p-white”]This is an intensive training curriculum, designed to build your knowledge from scratch. Learn to build dynamic website interfaces with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap Javascript, and React, and more …[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”VIEW MORE INFORMATION” style=”outline-custom” outline_custom_color=”#17355c” outline_custom_hover_background=”#10e1bb” outline_custom_hover_text=”#ffffff” size=”lg” align=”center” button_block=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fonline%2Ffrontend-web-development%2F|title:Frontend%20Web%20Development||”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1624018368285{padding-top: 5px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Fullstack Development” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24px|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fonline%2Ffullstack-software-development%2F|title:Fullstack%20Software%20Development||”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1634657936866{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}” el_class=”p-white”]In 24 intensive weeks, acquire the skills and knowledge of a Full Stack Developer, Learn and build your own complete web development portfolio from scratch to finish and change your career.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”VIEW MORE INFORMATION” style=”outline-custom” outline_custom_color=”#17355c” outline_custom_hover_background=”#10e1bb” outline_custom_hover_text=”#ffffff” size=”lg” align=”center” button_block=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Funivelcity.com%2Fonline%2Ffullstack-software-development%2F|title:Fullstack%20Software%20Development||”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
